getAllSql: select customerId, firstname, lastname, address, favoriteIcecream from customer
getCustomerSql: select customerId, firstname, lastname, address, favoriteIcecream from customer
insertCustomerSql: insert into customer (customerId, firstname, lastname, address, favoriteIcecream)
updateCustomerSql: update customer set firstname=?, lastname=?, address=?, favoriteIcecream=?
